content.rendered:
We started to connect with business partners through trade fairs and exhibitions in 2004. Since then, we have promoted the Blufilters Professional brand worldwide and established many successful initiatives.

Pictures speak louder than words, so let us present to you Bluefilters’ 40 years of industry experience in trade fairs photo shoots.

 

Aquatech Amsterdam 2021
HOGA Germany 2021
Moscow 2020

PIR Moscow 2020
PIR Moscow 2019
Amsterdam 2019

AQUATECH Shanghai 2018
KAZBUILD Almata 2018
Dubai 2018

AQUATECH Shanghai 2017
Baku 2017
Amsterdam 2017

WATEX Iran 2016
MCE Milan 2016
MCE Milan 2016

Amsterdam 2015
Shanghai 2015
Dubai 2015

AQUA-THERM Prague 2014
Tibilisi 2014
AQUA-THERM Wien 2014

AQUATECH Shanghai 2014
Dubai 2013
AQUATECH Amsterdam 2013

ROMTHERM Bucharest 2012
AQUA – THERM Kiev 2009
AQUATECH Amsterdam 2011

AQUA – THERM Kiev 2011
AQUA – THERM Kiev 2010
POLLUTEC Lyon 2010

Moscow 2010
AQUA – THERM Kiev 2009
Minsk 2009

AQUA – THERM Czech Rep. 2009
AQUATECH Amsterdam 2008
Spain 2008

Ukraine 2008
ECWATECH Moscow 2006
TIB Bucharest 2005

AQUATECH Plovdiv 2005
HUNGAROTHERM Budapest 2005
AQUA – THERM Kiev 2005

AQUA-THERM Moscow 2005
AQUATECH Amsterdam 2004
HOGA Munich 2004

AQUA-THERM Moscow 2004
INTERGASTRA Stuttgart 2004
